Field.name: TermsTypeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of payment terms

Field.name: TermsBasisDateCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the beginning of the terms period

Field.name: TermsDiscountPercent
Field.comment: Terms discount percentage, expressed as a percent, available to the purchaser if an invoice is paid on or before the Terms Discount Due Date

Field.name: TermsDiscountDueDate
Field.comment: Date payment is due if discount is to be earned expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TermsDiscountDaysDue
Field.comment: Number of days in the terms discount period by which payment is due if terms discount is earned

Field.name: TermsNetDueDate
Field.comment: Date when total invoice amount becomes due expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: TermsNetDays
Field.comment: Number of days until total invoice amount is due (discount not applicable)

Field.name: TermsDeferredDueDate
Field.comment: Date deferred payment or percent of invoice payable is due expressed in format CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: PercentOfInvoicePayable
Field.comment: Amount of invoice payable expressed in percent

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: DayOfMonth
Field.comment: The numeric value of the day of the month between 1 and the maximum day of the month being referenced

Field.name: PaymentMethodCode
Field.comment: Code identifying type of payment procedures
